description: Miki wants to be a famous top model around the world. One day she got the chance for the audition; if she passes the audition, she can get the chance to be a model overseas. She is very happy, but at the same time, she thinks of Love and Inori, because if she passes, she has to say farewell to them. She is puzzled when she realizes that she has to quit dance and Pretty Cure in order to fulfill her dream.

titles.title: Miki no Yume: Watashi Precure Yameru!!
Miki`s Dream: I`m Leaving Pretty Cure!
美希の夢 私プリキュアやめる!!
